name: Xerneas Prism Star
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

abilities.name: Path of Life
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to become your Active Pokémon, you may move any number of Energy from your other Pokémon to it.

attacks.name: Bright Horns
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Bright Horns during your next turn.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
